headline: Applied Materials, Lam Research and KLA Stocks Hit Record Highs
summary: Strong results from Taiwan's TSMC helped push U.S. semiconductor-equipment stocks to new peaks.    Shares in Applied Materials, KLA and Lam Research rose roughly 5% to 8% on Thursday morning.   All three stocks hit new intraday peaks, according to Dow Jones Market Data, and were among the best performers in the S&P 500.

headline: Why Is KLA Corporation (KLAC) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) jumped 8.3% in the afternoon session after Wells Fargo upgraded the stock to Overweight from Equal Weight, citing strong demand for advanced chips, while positive results from a major customer also lifted investor sentiment.

content.title: Why Is KLA Corporation (KLAC) Stock Soaring Today
content.summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) jumped 8.3% in the afternoon session after Wells Fargo upgraded the stock to Overweight from Equal Weight, citing strong demand for advanced chips, while positive results from a major customer also lifted investor sentiment.
